comment:
* Helper for performing location access checks.
 * @hide

methods.name: private static void logError(Context context, LocationPermissionQuery query, String errorMsg)
private static LocationPermissionResult checkAppLocationPermissionHelper(Context context, LocationPermissionQuery query, String permissionToCheck)
public static LocationPermissionResult checkLocationPermission(Context context, LocationPermissionQuery query)
methods.comment: Check if location permissions have been granted

methods.name: private static boolean checkManifestPermission(Context context, int pid, int uid, String permissionToCheck)
private static boolean checkSystemLocationAccess(@NonNull Context context, int uid, int pid, @NonNull String callingPackage)
public static boolean isLocationModeEnabled(@NonNull Context context, @UserIdInt int userId)
methods.comment: * @return Whether location is enabled for the given user.

methods.name: private static boolean isLocationBypassAllowed(@NonNull Context context, @NonNull String callingPackage)
public static String[] getLocationBypassPackages(@NonNull Context context)
methods.comment: * @return An array of packages that are always allowed to access location.

methods.name: private static boolean checkInteractAcrossUsersFull(@NonNull Context context, int pid, int uid)
private static boolean isCurrentProfile(@NonNull Context context, int uid)
private static boolean isAppAtLeastSdkVersion(Context context, String pkgName, int sdkVersion)
